tsps

Class TSPSPerson

  • java.lang.Object
    • tsps.TSPSPerson

  • public class TSPSPerson
extends java.lang.Object
    TSPS Person object, containing properties unique to a specific tracked person

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int age
      How long a person has been around (in seconds)
      Rectangle boundingRect
      Bounding rectangle that surrounds Person's shape
      processing.core.PVector centroid
      Center of mass of person
      java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PVector> contours
      Defines the rough outline of a Person
      boolean dead
      (deprecated)
      float depth
      Normalized (0.0-1.0) distance from camera.
      Rectangle haarRect
      Rectangle representing a detected HAAR feature (if there is one)
      processing.core.PVector highest
      Closest point to the camera (with Kinect).
      int id
      Unique ID, different for each Person as long as TSPS is running
      int lastUpdated
      (deprecated)
      int oid
      Ordered ID (not usually used), ID ranging from 0-Total Number of people
      processing.core.PVector opticalFlow
      Average motion within a Person's area
      processing.core.PVector velocity
      Speed since last update

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public int id
        Unique ID, different for each Person as long as TSPS is running

      • oid

        public int oid
        Ordered ID (not usually used), ID ranging from 0-Total Number of people

      • age

        public int age
        How long a person has been around (in seconds)

      • depth

        public float depth
        Normalized (0.0-1.0) distance from camera. For Kinect camera, highest value (1) is approx. 10 meters

      • centroid

        public processing.core.PVector centroid
        Center of mass of person

      • velocity

        public processing.core.PVector velocity
        Speed since last update

      • highest

        public processing.core.PVector highest
        Closest point to the camera (with Kinect). If using non-depth camera, represents brightest point on person.

      • opticalFlow

        public processing.core.PVector opticalFlow
        Average motion within a Person's area

      • boundingRect

        public Rectangle boundingRect
        Bounding rectangle that surrounds Person's shape

      • haarRect

        public Rectangle haarRect
        Rectangle representing a detected HAAR feature (if there is one)

      • contours

        public java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PVector> contours
        Defines the rough outline of a Person

      • lastUpdated

        public int lastUpdated
        (deprecated)

      • dead

        public boolean dead
        (deprecated)

    • Constructor Detail

        Create a TSPS Person object
        Parameters:
        PApplet - Pass in app to enable debug drawing of TSPS Person object
